org.taverna.server.localworker.remote.ImplementationException

    Package Description
    org.taverna.server.localworker.api  
    org.taverna.server.localworker.impl  
    org.taverna.server.localworker.remote
    Interfaces exported by worker classes to the server.
    org.taverna.server.master.interfaces
    Interfaces to the main worker classes that provide the magical power that drives the webapp front-end.
    org.taverna.server.master.rest.handler
    This package contains type handlers for the RESTful interface to Taverna Server.
    org.taverna.server.master.worker
    A Taverna Server back-end that works by forking off workflow executors.
